data.title: Mitchell Gold + Bob Williams Set to Resume Manufacturing Operations
data.meta_description: Parent company Surya Inc. has announced that 50 Mitchell Gold + Bob Williams upholstered furniture pieces are now available in more than 200 configurations for
data.text:
Parent company Surya Inc. has announced that 50 Mitchell Gold + Bob Williams upholstered furniture pieces are now available in more than 200 configurations for designers to purchase on Suryaâ€™s website. The curated offering includes sofas, sectionals, accent chairs, dining chairs, and counter stools, all manufactured and assembled in North Carolina. The full re-launch of the MG+BW brand, including an enhanced product assortment, is set to follow in the fall.

Production and distribution will resume at the 1-million square-foot footprint of original facilities across Statesville, Hiddenite, and the main factory in Taylorsville. According to a statement released by Surya, many former factory employees will be rehired.

At the helm of MG+BW operations is industry veteran Darryl Webster, who joined the company as Chief Operating Officer earlier this year. Webster has a history in multiple industries, including furniture brands Henredon and Williams Sonoma, Inc. Mitchell Gold, co-founder of MG+BW, continues to serve as an advisor.
